title: Stock Car Extreme v1.31 [noSteam] [full] [online/offline]
description:
Stock Car Extreme v1.31 (internal build 1.4)
--------------------------------------------

Multilanguage



About this Jimbus edition:
-------------------------

- Custom installer highly compressed to be able to make a single DVD9 release.
- The game is updated to 1.31 version.
- Nothing has been deleted.



Instructions:
-------------

1. Mount or decompress the .iso file.
2. Run "setup.exe" to install the game.
3. Always start the game with the file "GSC_Loader.exe" or use the shortcuts the installer creates.

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, it does.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: No, you do not.

Q: Does it work under Windows 8.1?
A: Yes, it does.



Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation.


Thanks to all the people of cs.rin.ru who made this possible
